Title: The high gorge opens into a smooth lake, it startles the world very much
Designer: Hangzhou Nr. 2 Cotton Textile Factory Revolutionary Committee (杭州第二棉纺织厂委员会)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: Workers and visitors parading near the Xin'an River Dam, with the man-made Qiandao Lake reservoir in the background. A Mao statue stands in the middle of the dam. Above the image a Mao quotation, praising the Chinese people's ambition and capability.
